name: Wild Racer
description:
Out run the timer in this retro racer with multiple characters and a branching race course.

Controls (Can be changed in the options menu):

z - Gas / Action
Shift - Brake / Cancel
Left / Right - Steer
Up / Down - Change radio

Built for the Lowrezjam 2020, the challenge was to build a game using only 64 x 64 resolution.
